channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: 15-year-old girl fatally shoots teacher and teenager at a Christian school in Wisconsin
item.description: Police say a 15-year-old student opened fire inside a study hall at a small Christian school in Wisconsin, killing a teacher and teenager.

item.title: Things to know about the shooting at a Christian school in Wisconsin
